DOC.detailed_description: This randomize ( study drug assign chance ) , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , parallel-group ( group patient treat time ) , single-center study . Participants randomly assign 1 5 cohort ( group ) define antipsychotic drug ( aripiprazole , quetiapine , olanzapine , risperidone paliperidone ) . Antipsychotics drug helpful treatment psychosis capacity ameliorate think disorder . Participants enter investigational site morning Day -1 stay morning Day 2 . Participants return study site subsequent assessment per study 's schedule . The total study length participant approximately 26 day , except participant receive aripiprazole total study length approximately 39 day .
